title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5250.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5250.2 - Definition

State Regulations
(a) A
jurisdictional protocol is a written agreement entered into by two or more law
enforcement agencies setting forth procedures to ensure the organized, coordinated, and prompt mobilization of personnel, equipment, services, or
facilities in order to achieve the fastest response to a 911
emergency. (b) AVL means Automatic

Vehicle Locator. (c) CAD means

Computer Aided Dispatch. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5250.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
